name: Pick Any 10 Plus a FREE Angle Brush
description:
Our hottest deal yet! Pick any 10 including eyeshadow, eyeliner, foundation, blush and correctors. All will come in 5 gram jars complete with sealed sifters and 1.5 grams of product in each.

These ten will also come with a FREE medium angle fluff brush. ($8.00 value)

Please list your ten choices in the Notes to Seller on the PayPal website. After the order is placed I will send you an email confirming your choices. Remember, foundation, blush and correctors are included too, in 5 gram jars!

For a full list of all colors, please visit http://goddessminerals.etsy.com

name: The Bow Vegan Mineral Eyeshadow Collection
description:
It has been requested a lot from my customers, so here it is! Seven gorgeous colors from red to violet and all the colors in between, plus Diamond Sparkle for a highlight and now a FREE Noir for a pure black eyeliner to complete the look!

You will receive nine (9) 5 gram jars full with 1.5 grams of product each. These highly pigmented mineral shadows can be applied dry, or wet for a foiled effect.

name: Storming - 10g Vegan Mineral Eyeshadow
description:
Dusty, shimmery grey-black eyeshadow.

Great used wet for an eyeliner with an edge, or dry for a nice smokey eye effect with some shimmer. You will receive a 10 gram jar complete with sifter and is 3.5 grams net of product.

Ingredients: Black mica, iron oxide, titanium dioxide, boron nitride

name: She's A Vamp - 10g Vegan Mineral Eyeshadow
description:
A pure black with shimmering red undertones. Used as an eyeshadow or as an eyeliner; the red shows up more when used wet for a foiled look, bringing the shimmer in this color out! Great alone or used with a lighter color on the lid and She's A Vamp in the outer V for dimension to your look. You will receive a 10g jar complete with sifter with 3.5g full of product.

This is our most popular color from the TWILIGHT collection!


Ingredients: Iron oxide, mica

name: Midnight Train - 10g Vegan Mineral Eyeshadow
description:
A gorgeous color as an eyeliner or as an eyeshadow, Midnight Train is a deep teal green which rubs into a green-blue color with golden flecks for a deep, prismatic color. You will find that this is more on the green end of teal instead of blue, so if you are looking for a blue based teal, please check out the store because Oceanica is a great blue based teal!

You will receive a 10g jar complete with sealed sifter and 3.5g of product.

Ingredients: Mica, titanium dioxide, iron oxide
